com.paydiant.android.core.service

Class PaymentAccountManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.service.PaymentAccountManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaymentAccountManagerService

    public class PaymentAccountManagerService
extends Object
implements IPaymentAccountManagerService
    Implementation class for the payment account manager facade.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FORWARDSLASH
      The Constant FORWARDSLASH.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaymentAccountManagerService()
      Default constructor for PaymentAccount Manager Service The constructor creates instance of the service and retrieves the single instance of the rest template from the RestTemplateContainer and assigns it to the restTemplate instance variable.

                                        boolean includeMetaData)

        Retrieve payment account.

        Note:To get the latest account balance information, use the IPaymentAccountManagerService.refreshPaymentAccountBalance(String) method. Returned PaymentAccountData from this method may not contain the latest account balance information.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • startPaymentAccountEnrollment

        public PaymentAccountEnrollment startPaymentAccountEnrollment(StartPaymentAccountEnrollment startPaymentAccountEnrollment)
        Description copied from interface: IPaymentAccountManagerService
        Starts a payment account enrollment.
        Specified by:
        startPaymentAccountEnrollment in interface IPaymentAccountManagerService
        Parameters:
        startPaymentAccountEnrollment - Initial payment account enrollment data
        Returns:
        payment account enrollment instance with statuses and additional required information. 201(CREATED) - Start payment account enrollment successful status, EnrollmentState.END occurred and flow is complete. 400(BAD_REQUEST) - Required additional data values not set - Enrollment type not set - Supported tender types not found - Duplicates not allowed 500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error - Processing error

      • continuePaymentAccountEnrollment

        public PaymentAccountEnrollment continuePaymentAccountEnrollment(ContinuePaymentAccountEnrollment continuePaymentAccountEnrollment)
        Description copied from interface: IPaymentAccountManagerService
        Continue payment account enrollment by providing additional information.
        Specified by:
        continuePaymentAccountEnrollment in interface IPaymentAccountManagerService
        Parameters:
        continuePaymentAccountEnrollment - payment account enrollment instance with additional information.
        Returns:
        the payment account enrollment instance with statuses and additional required information. 201(CREATED) - Continue payment account enrollment successful status, EnrollmentState.END occurred and flow is complete. 400(BAD_REQUEST) - PaydiantCorrelationId not found - Duplicates not allowed 500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error - Processing error
